achievements.name: Down Payment Liftoff
achievements.description: Kickstart your journey by saving your first $2,500. Every great accomplishment starts with a single, determined step toward your dream home.

achievements.name: Impulse Igniter
achievements.description: Tackle impulse spending head-on. Save at least $10 a day for 3 days in a row by consciously avoiding a non-essential purchase.

achievements.name: Foundation Frame
achievements.description: Build serious momentum by reaching a total of $5,000 saved. You're building the financial framework for your future home.

achievements.name: Consistent Committer
achievements.description: Strengthen your saving habit by putting aside at least $12 every day for 5 consecutive days. Consistency is key!

achievements.name: Homestead Basecamp
achievements.description: Establish a solid financial base by growing your down payment fund to $7,500. You're well on your way!

achievements.name: Auto-Save Architect
achievements.description: Play this interactive game to learn how to set up and optimize automated savings transfers, making your goals easier to reach.

achievements.name: Weekly Win
achievements.description: Prove your discipline by completing a full 7-day streak of saving at least $15 each day. This builds powerful habits.

achievements.name: The $10k Threshold
achievements.description: Cross the significant milestone of $10,000! This major achievement shows your dedication is paying off big time.

achievements.name: Fortnight Fortress
achievements.description: Build a fortress of financial discipline. Maintain a 14-day streak of saving at least $18 daily.

achievements.name: Halfway Home
achievements.description: You've reached $13,500, putting you over halfway to your down payment goal. The finish line is getting closer!

achievements.name: Safe Harbor Investor
achievements.description: Explore low-risk investment options like HYSAs and CDs in this educational game, aligning with your preference for safe returns.

achievements.name: Three-Week Triumph
achievements.description: Lock in your habits with an impressive 21-day streak of saving at least $20 every day.

achievements.name: Structure Secured
achievements.description: Grow your savings to an incredible $17,000. Your financial structure is strong enough to support your dream of homeownership.

achievements.name: Monthly Master
achievements.description: Achieve mastery over impulse spending by completing a full 30-day streak of saving at least $25 daily.

achievements.name: Pre-Approval Power
achievements.description: Hit $21,000 saved! This is a powerful amount that puts you in a great position when seeking mortgage pre-approval.

achievements.name: Mortgage Maze
achievements.description: Navigate the complexities of home loans in this quiz game. Learn key terms to become a savvy homebuyer.

achievements.name: Elite Endurance
achievements.description: Demonstrate elite financial endurance by maintaining a 45-day savings streak of putting away $28 daily.

achievements.name: Keys in Hand
achievements.description: You did it! Reach your ultimate goal of $25,000 saved for your home down payment. The keys to your future are in your hands.

achievements.name: Homeowner's Discipline
achievements.description: Complete a legendary 60-day streak saving $30 daily, proving you have the financial discipline required for successful homeownership.
